dashboard.description: Loki v2+ showcase using JSON NGINX access logs.

targets.expr: sum by (status) (count_over_time({chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", job=~"$job", filename=~"$filename"} | json |  __error__="" [$__interval]))

sum(count_over_time({chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", job=~"$job", filename=~"$filename"} | json | status >= 500 |__error__=""[$__interval])) / (sum(count_over_time({chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", job=~"$job", filename=~"$filename"} | json | __error__=""[$__interval]))/ 100)

options.content:
üìä Dashboard created by Ward Bekker (hope you like it!)

üê¶ Follow me on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/wardbekker) & [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/wardbekker/) for  Grafana Loki updates 

üé• Check out my [Grafana Loki video's](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLDGkOdUX1UjqEzcxQrbROMy8DN7MZv_h4) on Youtube

targets.expr: count(sum by (remote_addr) (count_over_time({chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", job=~"$job", filename=~"$filename"} | json |  __error__="" [$__interval])))
sum by (status) (count_over_time({chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", job=~"$job", filename=~"$filename"} | json |  __error__="" [$__interval]))
topk(10, sum by (remote_addr, geoip_country_code) (count_over_time({chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", job=~"$job", filename=~"$filename"} | json |  __error__="" [15m])))
topk(10, sum by (http_user_agent) (count_over_time({chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", job=~"$job", filename=~"$filename"} | json |  __error__="" [15m])))

topk(10, sum by (request_uri) (count_over_time({chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", job=~"$job", filename=~"$filename"} !~ `\.ico|\.svg|\.css|\.png|\.txt|\.js|\.xml` | json | status = 200 and request_uri != "/" | __error__="" [15m])))

dashboard.title: Loki - APT Econia Caddy Dashboard test
